Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/Lake
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Washington and Ashland, over normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Fulton, Ogden, Washington and Ashland then resume their normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/Lake.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Kedzie. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
